name: Containment (itch) (Daebak, okienoki)
description:
You wake up strapped to a hospital bed. You don't know how you got here, or why.  All you know is you want some answers, and you have to make some hard decisions to get them. Do you stay and talk or do you try a great escape? What will you risk with your choices? Play through to find out...

2 endings. 1 epilogue. 

Controls:
Up / Down Arrow keys - navigate through choices
Spacebar - select choice and advance story (continue)

Extract and run 'Containment.exe'
